recipe.title: Shaved Radish Salad With Walnuts And Mint
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Toast walnuts on a rimmed baking sheet, tossing once, until golden brown, 8–10 minutes. Let cool; crush with the flat side of a chef’s knife. Arrange radishes on a plate. Lightly season with salt and pepper and drizzle vinaigrette over; top with walnuts and mint.
